original_text: and remained there until the death of Herod. This was to fulfill what the Lord had spoken by the prophet, “Out of Egypt I called my son.”
korean_text: 헤롯이 죽기까지 거기 있었으니 이는 주께서 선지자를 통하여 말씀하신 바 애굽으로부터 내 아들을 불렀다 함을 이루려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: and remained there until the death of Herod.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 헤롯이 죽을 때까지 거기에 머물렀습니다.

sentences.original_text: what the Lord had spoken by the prophet
“Out of Egypt I called my son.”
